The Academy Award for Best Picture bụ otu n'ime Academy Awards nke a na-enye kwa afọ site n'aka Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS) kemgbe ihe nrite a malitere na 1929

Ihe nrite a na-agara ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ ma bụrụ naanị otu ụdị nke ọ bụla.  onye otu Oscar tozuru oke itinye nhọpụta na ịtụ vootu na ntuli aka ikpeazụ.  Ụdị foto kacha mma na-abụkarị ihe nrite ikpeazụ nke abalị, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka ihe nsọpụrụ kachasị mma nke emume a.
